thig6.6:4.1: Oh Buddha, my hero: homage to you!
thig6.6:4.4: and many other beings as well.
thig6.6:5.3: the eightfold path has been developed;
thig6.6:5.4: and cessation has been realized by me.
thig6.6:6.1: Previously I was a mother, a son,
thig6.6:6.2: a father, a brother, and a grandmother.
thig6.6:6.3: Failing to grasp the true nature of things,
thig6.6:7.1: Since I have seen the Blessed One,
thig6.6:7.2: this bag of bones is my last.
thig6.6:7.4: now there are no more future lives.
thig6.6:8.1: I see the disciples in harmony,
thig6.6:8.4: this is homage to the Buddhas!
thig6.6:9.1: It was truly for the benefit of many
thig6.6:9.2: that Māyā gave birth to Gotama.
thig6.6:9.3: He swept away the mass of suffering
thig6.6:9.4: for those stricken by sickness and death.
